descriptionHTML:
Everyone knows how important time is when you have to do a thing significant for you.

Be it you are a manager, a leader or even brave dad. With the SpecOps Watch Face you will wear your timepiece confidence and readiness to meet your most demanding challenges.

Ready to conquer the world!? Install SpecOps Watch Face and make your smartwatch combat ready!

IMPORTANT NOTE
Don't you know how to change colors within SpecOps? Here is a small instruction :)
You have to enter settings directly on your watch.
Just tap and hold your watch's screen and afterwards enter settings by tapping the small gear icon below SpecOps picture / icon. Choose the desired color (by taping on thumbnails) and swipe watch’s screen from left to right to accept your selection.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
comments: Android wear 2.0 compatibility broke this watchface on my original moto360. Too bad, I used to love this watchface :(
Been using for half a day and like it generally. It needs refinement but I get the sense the developer intends to improve it
should have options for night mode. not everyone love the bright green

Suggestions (previous comment deleted). Can you add optional watch hands with something darker or phosporic greenish? Current white hand dial looks unreal. adding watch battery level and weather related are always welcome
The date doesn't quite site right in the box. Seems like a low res watch face. Numbers look blurry. Was hoping to like this more. Screen caps make it look nice.
